page.title: 03Around Peterlee.
page.content:
The council are allowing the building of more houses to make{Peterlee bigger. Most of them are being built next to{Castle Eden Dene.
The{Chemical factory}that is close to my house makes a horrible smell that the wind sometimes carries over. At {Fisher_ Price}there was a{chemical {leakage}and a gas escaped. Six women were taken to hospital for treatment.
{Peterlee}could be improved by having more swimming pools, that also are cheaper, and more curcusses, fairs and carnivals. There should be more playgrounds with a lot of swings and more roundabouts, because the swings are always full.
